Technologies i focus on:

I enjoy building software for the web. The main reason is the openness of the plattform. There's no app-store and no manual installation required to share my work - a link is enough.

My focus lies on Frontend technologies. I have good knowledge of the core-technologies and concepts that make up the JS frameworks Angular and Vue. In order to build feature-rich applications, having only client-side code normally isn't enough. Therefore i also have decent knowledge in building Rest API's with Express.

Over the years i worked with many more languages and frameworks. I enjoyed these technologies but it's nothing i focus on.

Projects

CrimeView

A web app which analyses a route based on a Polygon, Line or Radius for 1 - 3 german cities and displays all districts (de: Stadt- Landkreise) with their respective crime rate (# of offences per 100.000 inhabitants) on it.

CrimeView combines data from three different sources.

  • Opendatasoft - Geojson of districts
  • Google Places - City predictions and details
  • AWS Lambda - Crime statistics

See it live or Check out the code
